Player History
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/26/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Injured on 8/25/1989 with a Bruised Heel, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 9/27/1990, off Greg Swindell (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/19/1991, off Steve Avery (NYY)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/1991, hitting .320 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/1991, hitting .611 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
